KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WVLT) - Cracker Barrel and Dolly Parton have teamed up for a special VIP package contest in light of her appearance in the Macys Thanksgiving Parade.

articles.title: JBL Details How The Undertaker Convinced Fans That He Is Dead - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Former WWE Champion JBL shares a never heard before and funny story of how The Undertaker made fans believe that he is dead.
articles.content: The Undertaker is one of the greatest professional wrestlers of all time. A Hall Of Fame career spanning more than three decades, seven world championships, countless terrifying and awe-inspiring mom… [+2185 chars]

articles.title: David Fincher signs a four-year exclusivity deal with Netflix - Engadget
